item.title: 10 Questions: Dan Norris – ‘It is vital public transport in Bristol and across the West of England improves at pace’
item.description: Dan Norris has been metro mayor for the West of England since 2021 and plans to serve until at least 2025. As mayor he leads the West of England Combined Authority which makes important decisions on transport, housing, the environment…
